Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman AU400e automated clinical system analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Oral Fluid 6-Acetylmorphine Enzyme Immunoassay, Calibrators, and Controls for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of 6-Acetylmorphine in oral fluid on automated chemistry analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of 6-Acetylmorphine in neat human oral fluid collected into the LZI Oral Fluid Collector at a cutoff of 4 ng/mL; for prescription use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; provides preliminary results and requires confirmation by GC/MS or LC/MS.
